pullrequest.title: win_addpath.bat updated to work with gazebo 8

content.raw:
I realize that this line is just being updated from an older version of Qt to a newer version of Qt, but the hard-coded path raises some red flags to me. This path will not be helpful if the script user has installed their copy of Qt onto another drive or within another folder.

I suppose we could just say that non-standard installations of Qt need to be dealt with by the user and are outside the scope of this script.
content.html:
I realize that this line is just being updated from an older version of Qt to a newer version of Qt, but the hard-coded path raises some red flags to me. This path will not be helpful if the script user has installed their copy of Qt onto another drive or within another folder.

I suppose we could just say that non-standard installations of Qt need to be dealt with by the user and are outside the scope of this script.
